'''19w11b''' is the twenty-sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on March 14, 2019<ref>{{snap|19W11b|id=|March 13, 2019}}</ref>, which modifies some menu screens.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Auto-jump is now also listed in accessibility settings.
* Transparency setting is now labeled "Chat Text Opacity" instead of "Chat Opacity".

=== Items ===
'''[[Cocoa beans]]'''
* Reverted name from "Cocoa" back to "Cocoa Beans".
